attributes.action: Scrap Stamp Duty for Disabled Buying Poperties for their Old age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Disabled elderly have to move to some more suitable accomodations eg bungalows, flats etc. to live with their disablities and infirmities. Stamp duty can be a big disincentive.

2. Dividend for Social Services and eventually for the Tax payer is obvious.

Please scrap the stamp duty for all purchases of personal property by diabled people for their personal occupation.
